section.title: List Breeder Bills of Materials
section.para: To access the master list of Breeder Bills of Materials, select the "List Breeder Bills of Materials" option. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Breeder Bills of Materials Master List

section.para: At the top of the screen is a "Search For" field. To search for a Breeder Bill of Materials, begin typing in the search field. As you type, the Item list will automatically scroll toward the Item Number you are typing. You can also search for Items manually by scrolling through the list.
